CmdLine: apt-get update &&     DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y         build-essential         libpcre3-dev         python-minimal         unzip         wget     && apt-get clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

CmdLine: mkdir /src/ &&     for v in $(seq 80 88); do         cd /src/ &&         wget https://github.com/danmar/cppcheck/archive/1.$v.zip &&         unzip 1.$v.zip &&         cd /src/cppcheck-1.$v &&         make SRCDIR=build CFGDIR=/opt/cppcheck-1.$v/share/cfg HAVE_RULES=yes              CXXFLAGS="-O2 -DNDEBUG -Wall -Wno-sign-compare -Wno-unused-function" &&         mkdir -p /opt/cppcheck-1.$v/bin /opt/cppcheck-1.$v/share &&         cp -r cfg /opt/cppcheck-1.$v/share &&         cp cppcheck /opt/cppcheck-1.$v/bin/cppcheck-1.$v;         fail=$?;         if [ $fail -ne 0 ]; then break; fi     done && [ $fail -eq 0 ]

CmdLine: for bin in /opt/cppcheck-1.*/bin/cppcheck-1.*; do         ln -s $bin /usr/bin/;     done
